# ts-transforms

> An ETL framework built upon xlucene-evaluator

## Installation

```bash
# Using yarn
yarn global add ts-transforms
# Using npm
npm install --global ts-transforms
```

This a package within the [Teraslice](https://github.com/terascope/teraslice) monorepo. See our [documentation](https://terascope.github.io/teraslice/docs/packages/ts-transforms/overview) for more information or the [issues](https://github.com/terascope/teraslice/issues?q=is%3Aopen+is%3Aissue+label%3Apkg%2Fts-transforms) associated with this package

Pull requests are welcome. For major changes, please open an issue first to discuss what you would like to change.
